column4: cna anyone help me set my resolution in xorg.conf the ones ive tried are not being picked up?
now xorg auto detects resolution , you need to change it with xrandr extension
i.e. xrandr 1024x768 would that be an acceptable command?
sont remember the exact syntax, look up "man xrandr", i don;t have access to xrandr right now
np thanx will check it out otherwise win for now been working on this for 2days now
delete your xorg.conf, xorg should automatically shoose the most optimum resolution for you, if it doesn't then its a bug in xorg and you need to email them here xorg@freedesktop.org
